secret_rule: Only items that are typically associated with influential social media trends or viral challenges can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "TikTok dance prop" and "ALS Ice Bucket Challenge bucket".

However, I notice both are related to viral internet/social media trends or challenges. So my best initial guess might be: "An item associated with a viral internet/social media phenomenon or challenge"
